mapper.insert: /* SmsChargeHistMapper.getSmsChargeRegistSaveInsert */ INSERT INTO CET_PGLOG_T ( OGN_CD, CHARGE_DATE, CHARGE_TIME, CHARGE_ID, PGRESOURCE, CHARGE_AMT, SUCCESS_YN, CONTROLNO, APPROVALNUM, RESULTCODE, RESULTMESSAGE, RTN_DATE, RTN_TIME, RTN_ID, RTN_CONTROLNO, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, SMS_BASE_QTY, SMS_CHARGE_QTY, SPP_CORP_CD, SPP_SLIP_NO, SPP_SLIP_FG, SPP_POST_NO, SPP_ADDR, SPP_ADDR_DTL, SPP_TEL_NO, PG_FG, PG_VAN_CD, ORDER_NO, CASH_YN, CASH_AUTHNO ) VALUES ( #{selectOrgnCd}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #{regId}, '*', '0', 'Y', '*', '', '0000', '임의등록', '', '', '', '', #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, #{smsBaseQty}, #{smsChargeQty}, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '0', '', '', '', '' )

/* SmsChargeHistMapper.getSmsQtySaveInsert */ MERGE INTO CET_SMSPT_T USING DUAL ON ( OGN_CD = #{selectOrgnCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET SMS_QTY = #{smsQty}, MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( OGN_CD, SMS_QTY, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{selectOrgnCd}, #{smsQty}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
